channel.title: Posts on Pranjal Panwar's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Pranjal Panwar's Blog

item.title: Day 9
item.description: I started reading about CI/CD and how is it used in our work.

item.title: Day 8
item.description: I did the final step of pushing my code into my Github repository and deployed my Hugo website to Github Pages .

item.title: Day 7
item.description: I learnt about building and deploying website to Github Pages. Then I built my Hugo website .

item.title: Day 6
item.description: I launched my site on my local machine with the Hugo built-in server and again edited some information in configuration file to fix some bits and pieces.

item.title: Day 5
item.description: I customized information in config.toml file to the way i wanted it . I also created my first blog post .

item.title: Day 4
item.description: I cloned hugo-coder theme for my website and also created a new Github repository https://github.com/Pranjal750/Pranjal750.github.io where I will deploy my site later.

item.title: Day 3
item.description: I created a new website with Hugo . I learnt about different themes that i would use in my website.

item.title: Day 2
item.description: I learnt about hugo and how is it used t make a website. I also installed hugo and git in my Linux operating system .

item.title: Day 1
item.description: I learnt about Git, Github and how to work in them. I also learnt about markdown format of writing and created my first Github page written in markdown.
